name: Date Night (owly-bee)
description:
A very short and sweet game involving stargazing with your datemate!

Made for Pastel Jam, this is my first game made with the Bitsy engine!

It took about an hour to make, most of which was spent learning the controls and making that starry sky.

Controls: Use the arrow keys to navigate, interact with characters/objects, and advance dialogue. Very simple!

Update 6/10/18: Redid some of the graphics for a better viewing experience!
